dct_title_s: World distribution of spirochetal diseases: 2. Relapsing fevers (louse-borne and tick-borne)
dct_description_sm: American Geographical Society of New York. Alternate title: World distribution of spirochetal diseases: 2. relapsing fevers louse-borne and tick-borne. Briesemeister elliptical equal-area projection. On upper right margin: Atlas of distribution of diseases - plate 16. Verso: Basic sources.
dct_publisher_sm: New York, NY : American Geographical Society, 1955.
